original_title: Dreams Look Different in the Distance
overview: "So much of who I am is grounded in paradox," she begins. "Sometimes I feel I'm being seen for all the wrong things, and that I've fallen into a cycle of having to prove myself over and over again." Want to know what's inside the singer's head? Here's a perfect portrait.
tagline: Shouldn't love you, but I couldn't help it
title: Dreams Look Different in the Distance
